sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function CurrentBody() { const [openedDiseasesList, setOpenedDiseasesList] = useState(false); const [user, setUser] = useState({ email: "", username: "", password: "", weight: null, height: null, birthDate: new Date(), diseases: "", budgetPerMealsDay: 0, disponibilityForWorkout: "", }); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/users").then((res) => {}); }); let sexes = ["Male", "Female", "Other"]; let inputElement = sexes.map((gender) => ( )); const handleInput = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const openDiseaseList = () => setOpenedDiseasesList(true); const closeDiseaseList = () => setOpenedDiseasesList(false); const handleSubmit = () => { axios.post("http://localhost:8000/api/add_user", user).then((res) => {}); }; return (

Registration






{inputElement}


{openedDiseasesList ? (

) : null}
); } export default CurrentBody;
